column5: Our cozy bungalow by the sea is the perfect place to relax and enjoy a beach vacation with friends and family. Whether staying for a quick weekend getaway, or a week of fun in the sun....our space will provide you with all of the comfort and amenities of home. We do have an age limit and do not rent to anyone under 25 years of age. There is parking in front of the house or the back alley. We are located approximately 3 blocks from the seawall, just a short walk away from the great restaurants.
